channel.title: Softlayer_scale_policy_action_scale on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_scale_policy_action_scale on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Action_Scale
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Action_Scale Service Datatype Description A policy action to scale a group. A group can be scaled to an absolute member number or by a relative amount using a fixed number or a percentage. Methods createObject Create a one-time policy trigger. deleteObject Delete this action. editObject Edit this action. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Action_Scale record. getScalePolicy Retrieve the policy this action is on.

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Action_Scale
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Action_Scale Service Datatype Description Local amount The number to scale by. This number has different meanings based on type. Type: integer createDate When this action was created. Type: dateTime deleteFlag When set and true any edit that happens on this object, be it calling edit on this directly or setting as a child while editing a parent object, will end up being a deletion.
